SELECT * FROM ( SELECT psi.*, tr.bus_line, tr.current_station, bs.station_name, bl.`mode` AS mode_name, bl.stations as bus_line_stations, bl.`name` as bus_line_name, s.`name` AS student_name, s.student_number, s.head_img, bj.grade, bj.class_name, bbi.number AS bus_number, bbi.valid AS bus_valid FROM `picked_students_info` AS psi LEFT JOIN transport_record AS tr ON psi.transport_record_id = tr.id LEFT JOIN bus_stations AS bs ON tr.current_station = bs.id LEFT JOIN bus_line AS bl ON tr.bus_line = bl.id LEFT JOIN bus_base_info AS bbi ON `bl`.bus_base_info = bbi.id LEFT JOIN student AS s ON psi.student_id = s.id LEFT JOIN banji AS bj ON s.banji = bj.id ) AS V WHERE bus_valid > 0
AND bus_number ='${busNumber}'
AND station_name = '${busStation}'
AND grade = '${gradeName}'
AND class_name = '${className}'
and DATE_FORMAT(board_time,'%Y-%m-%d') >= #{queryStartTime}
and DATE_FORMAT(board_time,'%Y-%m-%d') <= #{queryFinishTime}
OR bus_number LIKE CONCAT('%', '${keyWord}', '%') OR station_name LIKE CONCAT('%', '${keyWord}', '%') OR bus_line_name LIKE CONCAT('%', '${keyWord}', '%')
ORDER By board_time DESC, bus_number ASC

SELECT * -- 根据学号和 transport_record_id 查找该学生的上下车信息 FROM picked_students_info as psi LEFT JOIN student ON student.id = psi.student_id where student.student_number = #{studentNumber} AND psi.transport_record_id = #{transportRecordId}
